ballot_index.name: basic_building_elements
ballot_index.description: The basic elements that define spaces (such as rooms and gangways); the building elements that bound these spaces (i. e. walls beams slabs etc.); the building elements inside the spaces (such as HVAC elements); and elements that describe the structure of buildings (i. e. example storeys).

ballot_package.name: basic_building_elements
ballot_package.description: The basic elements that define spaces (such as rooms and gangways); the building elements that bound these spaces (i. e. walls beams slabs etc.); the building elements inside the spaces (such as HVAC elements); and elements that describe the structure of buildings (i. e. example storeys).
